post.author: pistonfan92
post.body:
hey everyone! i am working on customizing doom 3. im a little new to it. but i know a bit about it ; ). i was just asking if someone would be kind enough to just take me through the process, like a tutorial. step by step. starting with exporting it and bringing the project to the actual game. if there is a website that would be great.

thanks for your time.

post.author: pistonfan92
post.body:
o and also i have something to add. i just need help on the blender to md5 script itself. all i want to know is what do i type in exactly for the
MD5Mesh File:..........
MD5Anime File:..........
and the Export action:..........

i know this is a very silly question to most of you but im confused with it and i cant seem to figure it out.

i could send you the files but i don't know if i trust you lol. but we'll see.


thanks for all your time.
